dailyCheckIn.validation: It makes sense you feel anxious today — you're managing a lot. You have three project deadlines, a team meeting, and personal commitments all converging.

quickFixes.title: Breathing Exercise
quickFixes.description: Take 5 minutes for a grounding breath exercise

quickFixes.title: Short Walk
quickFixes.description: Step outside for a quick walk to reset

quickFixes.title: Gratitude Prompt
quickFixes.description: Write down 3 things you're grateful for

dailyCheckIn.guidedSupport: When you're feeling overwhelmed, try breaking your tasks into smaller chunks. You've handled stressful situations like this before — you have the skills.
dailyCheckIn.miniInsight: You mentioned feeling rushed 3 times today. Consider batching similar tasks together tomorrow to reduce context switching.
